content:
The Department of Mathematics of the University of Manchester is appointing a postdoctoral research fellow to work on the EPSRC-funded project "Monoidal bicategories, linear logic and operads" with me (University of Manchester) and Marcelo Fiore (University of Cambridge).

Deadline for applications is 23rd January 2023. For further information, see here.

From the category theory mailing list:

Dear all,

I am writing to invite applications for 10-month postdoctoral position in Higher Category Theory:

https://jobs.leeds.ac.uk/Vacancy.aspx?ref=EPSMA1115

The position is funded by an AFOSR research project whose general goal is to extend the connections between Category Theory and Logic to higher categories.

The grant is held at the University of Leeds, but the successful candidate will have the opportunity to be based at the University of Manchester.

The deadline for applications is Wednesday 3rd July. 

Interviews will be held on Tuesday 16th July. 

Please do not hesitate to contact me for further information.

With best regards (and apologies for multiple postings),

Nicola

==

Dr Nicola Gambino

Department of Mathematics, University of Manchester

https://personalpages.manchester.ac.uk/staff/Nicola.Gambino/
